messages.subject: Kabuto Picture
messages.msgSnippet: Someone on the newsgroup had suggested that I draw a kabuto with a black background with sakura pedals falling.  I have completed the request and it can be
messages.messageBody:
Someone on the newsgroup had suggested that I draw a kabuto with a
black background with sakura pedals falling. I have completed the
request and it can be found in the Samurai Artwork folder on the
Photo page.
Tell me what you think. You may use it as a desktop or screensaver
for your own PC but it is protected by copyright law. So, if you'd
like to use it for some other purpose, please get my permission
first. Contact me at bkirkham@....

Here's the link directly to the pic:
http://photos.groups.yahoo.com/group/samuraihistory/vwp?.dir=/
Samurai+Artwork&.dnm=Sakura+Kabuto.jpg&.src=gr&.view=t&.hires=t

Thanks.
Brandon
